TopicTitle: "Eve: Order Zero" -- a KSP Graphic Novel (POSTLUDE COMPLETE...bet you didn't see THAT coming.)

Articles.Content:
[quote name='Kuzzter']As if, indeed! In a completely unrelated note, do you make planet textures? Asking for a friend :)[/QUOTE]  

Not particularly great ones, but I can make custom planets that look good (I can't make a Jool texture that's better than stock, if that's what your friend wants, but I could make a procedural or semi-procedural rocky or icy planet that would have a nice stockalike texture because of Kopernicus being a powerful tool. I am not the best by any means. [URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88962-The-Plernerts%21"]Felsmak [/URL]or [URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/133416-1-0-4-Kopernicus-Uncharted-Lands-v0-1-27Oct15-Official-Pre-Release!"]KillAshley[/URL] would likely be a better choice.)

I am not the best by any means. [URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88962-The-Plernerts%21"]Felsmak [/URL]or [URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/133416-1-0-4-Kopernicus-Uncharted-Lands-v0-1-27Oct15-Official-Pre-Release!"]KillAshley[/URL] would likely be a better choice.)[/QUOTE]  

My friend tried to PM you regarding this, but your inbox is full :)

[quote name='Kuzzter']My friend tried to PM you regarding this, but your inbox is full :)[/QUOTE]  

Tell your friend to try again, I dumped my mailbox into the star Alternis.

[quote name='Kuzzter']Right, about that. I have a story to tell, and I'm gonna tell it. It's still forming, and maybe it won't be as epic as an Eve rescue, or maybe it will. But my own counsel will I keep on where that story takes place. :)[/QUOTE]  

I couldn't have said it better myself.  

Happy landings!

[quote name='r\_rolo1']Hey, haven't you heard the news? Dres is not alone for atleast 5 game versions ;) In fact it might be the planet in game with more company now :D[/QUOTE]  

Dres has been abandoned by players for years. It needs the love, or it'll die!

[quote name='SpaceplaneAddict']Dres has been abandoned by players for years. It needs the love, or it'll die![/QUOTE]  

[video=youtube;Swvf3w6hcY4]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Swvf3w6hcY4[/video]

[quote name='SpaceplaneAddict']Dres has been abandoned by players for years. It needs the [U]love[/U], or it'll die![/QUOTE]  

"You keep using that word. I do not think it means what you think it means."  

Happy landings!

Dres deserves love, but it doesn't get any. Dres have become the laughingstock of the KSP community, but no longer.  

Sola, notum fecit!

[quote name='Starhawk']"You keep using that word. I do not think it means what you think it means."  

Happy landings![/QUOTE]  

Love, meant as a show of appreciation towards Dres. Drew is lonely. The dresteroids don't talk to it, and players have neglected it! Like a passing memory, it will fade if we not show love for it.

@Kuzzter: Lt Kernel Mitch Kerman asked me to request a story featuring the secretive KSMC. He'd like to know more. Apparently it's so secretive even he doesn't know much... And if you're going to test-drive stuff:  

[spoiler=ComingSoon]  

[img]http://i.imgur.com/3kVqgyc.jpg[/img]  

[/spoiler]

**Edited <time datetime="2015-11-16T16:24:22Z" title="11/16/2015 04:24  PM" data-short="8 yr">November 16, 2015</time> by Angel-125**
\*le ding\*
\*Applause\* I'm sad to see it end, but I'm looking forward to what comes next!
I second the motion to go to Jool. And maybe stop at Dres on the way.
Wait, why didn't Bill and Jeb get promotions?

[quote name='SpaceplaneAddict']Wait, why didn't Bill and Jeb get promotions?[/QUOTE]  

To get a promotion they have to deserve it, and there has to be a job opening or 'billet' at that rank. While Bill and Jeb didn't get thrown out of Kerbfleet for their actions, they didn't get off scot-free either. So that's one reason--the second is that right now the Fleet doesn't have a job for engineer of Comder rank or for an Air Service (full) Kernel. Note that Lt. Commander Montgomery Scott of Starfleet stayed at that rank for the entire five year mission despite repeated heroics; a promotion to Commander would have put him in charge of training engineers somewhere, or as first officer on a ship other than Enterprise.   

Right now actually the ranks are all where I need them to be for the Big Darn Mission I've always dreamed of. Val is the senior officer (excepting Adm. Shirley, of course, who no longer goes on missions). Jeb and Dilsby are of equivalent rank in different services, which gives them complementary roles supporting Val. Then we have Bill and Bob one rank further down from those two, and you can imagine that they would be in charge of the engineering and science sections of the BDM respectively with a team of looties, junior looties and enzins under them as needed.   

All is occuring as I have foreseen it!  

So, I'm doing a few things now. One is taking a little break. This last bit took a lot of time, and got me a little burned out. I'm putting some things together for the Postlude to E:O0 (no predicted date, sorry) and also testing ships for the BDM. The SuperPogo X1 was one of those ships. I can say so far that I've made some really 'good' landings with it. We are on the X4 now :) I may open a thread to show the development progress towards BDM, and I may do that in comic form. We'll see how it goes and whether following the progress of a bunch of failed launches, emergency ejections, and not-quite-orbits tells the story I want to tell.  

As for where Kerbfleet goes next--that's already decided. Actually it's been decided for a while. So if you want to spam for a particular location or another, I think there are other threads for that. Or just go there yourselves, I'm not a \*\*\*\*\*\* charter service. :)

Well, "postlude" is "epilogue". In any case, such a complex mission with the air service required can only mean one thing  

Jool-5

[quote name='juanml82']"postlude" is "epilogue"[/QUOTE]  

[url]http://the-difference-between.com/postlude/epilogue[/url]

Ah, the lost art of "actually looking it up" :)

congrats at the end of very beautiful story, may i suggest a poll at which planet should the next story be? provided you continue your writing at similar stories the obvious choices are Jool system, Dres, Eeloo and Moho
